title: My LoL client doesn't start
body: Hi. I was playing some league and when i finished the game i closed it. After an hour, i wanted to play again, so i opened my LoL launcher. But it didn't start. I opened Task Manager and i found this : http://prntscr.com/dndnnx. I saw that LoL was in 1068, then it closed automatically. What do i do. I deleted all of the stupid things and lol launcher and rads and project things, and i still don't know what to do {{champion:122}}

replies.body: Does this persist after restarting your computer? The process may have simply been unable to close properly, so a reboot may help.
Actually it's fixed, had to reinstall lol
